name: Deep Descent
description:
Deep Descent. Pilot your landing module carefully down into the depths!

Controls:

  • Left/Right (Or A/D) to rotate the module.
  • Ctrl or Left Click to thrust.

If you have an XBOX Controller I highly recommend downloading the Windows version of the game and using the controller for much more fine control. Left Thumbstick for rotation, and Button A for thrust.

NOTES:

  • Land on the landing pads to refuel
  • Pickup health packs to refill health
  • Avoid hitting the walls!
  • Refueling pads disappear after you use them

Can you get the world record deepest depth score? I'm tracking global highscores in the game!
